Transform the three-way intersection into a single-pass aggregation by:

what_worked:
Applied single_pass_aggregation, prefetch_fact_join, early_filter: ** 
Rewrote the three-way INTERSECT using a single-pass aggregation strategy. First pre-filtered date_dim to a CTE, then extracted distinct (customer_key, date) pairs from each fact table with channel markers via UNION ALL, aggregated to find (customer_key, date) pairs appearing in all three channels, and finally joined with customer to get names and count distinct (name, date) pairs.

**Expected speedup:** 2-3x by eliminating multiple DISTINCT operations and INTERSECT operators, reducing interm
why_it_worked: Consolidating repeated scans into CASE aggregates reduces I/O from N scans to 1; Pre-joining filtered dimensions with fact table before aggregation reduces join input; Applying selective filters early reduces intermediate row counts before expensive operations
